articles.title: Vision Pro: As Apple headset reaches Europe, will VR ever hit the mainstream? - BBC.com
articles.description: As Apple's Vision Pro headset launches in the UK, can it finally kickstart the virtual reality market?
articles.content:
By Zoe Kleinman, Technology editor
The Vision Pro launched in the UK and parts of Europe on Friday
To get a sense of the public interest in the Vision Pro, Apple's very high-tech, very expensive vi… [+7467 chars]
